# GitHub Copilot Instructions

This is a movement artist portfolio website built with Astro and Tailwind CSS.

## Project Context

- **Artist**: Gella Gonzales - Movement Artist
- **Tech Stack**: Astro, Tailwind CSS, HTML5 Video, TypeScript
- **Design**: Minimalist aesthetic inspired by eusexua.fkatwi.gs
- **Deployment**: Ready for Vercel or Netlify

## Key Components

- Hero section with video background
- Masonry-style gallery
- Responsive navigation

## Content Guidelines

- Maintain elegant, minimalist design language
- Focus on visual storytelling through dance
- Use subtle animations and smooth transitions
- Prioritize performance and accessibility
- Keep mobile-first responsive design

## Development Notes

- All components are in `/src/components/`
- Global styles use Tailwind CSS utilities
- Media assets go in `/public/images/` and `/public/videos/`
- Contact form needs backend integration (Netlify Forms recommended)
